sentences.english: Indra worried that this powerful sage would one day want to usurp the position of king of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他担心这位强有力的圣哲有一天会篡夺天帝的位置。

sentences.english: Yoga Poses such as the Half Spinal Twist and the Sage Twist primarily benefit the spine and back.
sentences.chinese: 半脊柱扭转和圣哲马里骑式主要使背部和后部受益。

sentences.english: Also called Marichi's Yoga Pose, the Sage Twist Pose benefits the abdominal organs and spine.
sentences.chinese: 圣哲马里琪式，使腹内器官和脊柱受益。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
worthy predecessor/distinguished person of the past/former sage
saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
another name for Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3]
great person of the past/venerable forebear/the great and the good
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
Confucius (551-479 BC), Chinese thinker and social philosopher, also known as 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3]
